channel.title: OldSchoolScape :)
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2yy2udt.jpg[/img][/center] [center]11x EXP|Curses|Perfect Hybriding|Duel Arena|Legends AFTER BETA|Stable Economy|Old School Server|Pvp Drops & Armour|F OldSchoolScape webclient : http://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=OldSchoolScapee OldSchoolScape Features • 24/7 Active Skilling, PvMing and PKing • Active forums Server • Nomad boss, for the ultimate PvM experience • Updates every other day guaranteed • Excellent, professional, and dedicated staff • Server Events, and automatic daily lottery drawings • Starter pack, and ::master option • Stable economy, no economy-resets • Amazing benefits and zones dedicated for our donors • Vote Shop and Highscores • TokHaar-Kal Cape, fight "Prime" Jad • All PvP items, chaotics, nex sets • Battle-Mage and Trickster Armour • Amazing slayer system, with working Slayer Helm
We are a PKing & Skilling server with a 100% GUARANTEED uptime status.
Are you looking for a server with little-to-no lag? Are you looking for a server with an active wilderness? Are you looking for a server with guaranteed updates at least twice a week? Then OldSchoolScape is the right place for you. It all starts here.[/center] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33jrchz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/24yad8y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/avoe14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2966bn.jpg[/img]
Credits : 99% Verntix-PKz 1% me
It's my first time making server :( and i hope players join :( cuz it means so much to me im going to edit it ,,at first i made it and in the future there is alot of ideas to do with it :) it's going to be 25% Verntix and 75% me :D
